title: The end of payment friction: Why stablecoins and on-chain liquidity are winning | Opinion
body: Disclosure: The views and opinions expressed here belong solely to the author and do not represent the views and opinions of crypto.news’ editorial. Global commerce is expanding rapidly while the traditional payment systems remain outdated, expensive, and slow. Both companies and individuals struggle with high transaction fees and long settlements, and some even have very limited access to the banking systems. You might also like: Stablecoins are inevitable but can’t scale without a truly private digital dollar | Opinion People and businesses have been relying on outdated and inefficient systems for transferring money across borders for decades before the emergence of cryptocurrencies, specifically stablecoins. The main problems with traditional banking and financial service providers are payment delays, high fees, and liquidity shortages. Luckily, stablecoins and on-chain liquidity providers are addressing the issues by offering up-to-date, real-time, and low-cost transactions. Traditional payments are failing businesses From merchants in Africa to freelancers in Southeast Asia to businesses in Latin America, individuals and companies have been suffering from delays, high fees, and liquidity issues in cross-border payments. For example, using SWIFT, the global messaging network for financial transactions, has faced strong criticism for its inefficiency in global payments. While 66% of the SWIFT transactions arrive within 24 hours, it usually takes one to three business days for the funds that don’t need manual confirmation to be transferred in normal conditions—some transactions could take up to one month if they involve manual checks. Let’s not forget the transaction fees that come with using SWIFT—sending fees, receiving fees, intermediary bank fees, and sometimes, foreign exchange fees. Some of the main reasons behind the inefficiency of SWIFT transactions are compliance checks, incorrect payment details, and the involvement of multiple intermediary banks, to name a few. Traditional fintech isn’t enough The rise of digital payment platforms like Wise, PayPal, and Stripe has improved accessibility for many individuals and businesses in developed countries, but they still depend on traditional financial networks. The problems with traditional payment systems come as the demand has been constantly rising. The global cross-border settlements reached $190.1 trillion in value in 2023, and the number is expected to surpass $290 trillion by 2030, according to a Foley report last August. For every cross-border transaction to successfully reach its destination, it would have to go through multiple layers of processing and intermediaries—each layer adds fees and potential delays to the payments. A business in Nigeria that receives payments from Europe, for instance, would normally need to convert its funds multiple times—from euro to US dollar to naira—before cashing out from a local bank. This will cost the business with extra fees. This suggests a need for a payment system that eliminates these friction points. Both businesses and individuals need to access real-time transactions and liquidity. That’s why stablecoins, like Tether ( USDT ), and on-chain liquidity providers, like MANSA, have been seeing impressive growth over the last few years. Real solution: Stablecoins and on-chain liquidity Unlike the traditional banking system, stablecoins—cryptocurrencies pegged to a fiat asset like the US dollar—operate 24/7 without any middlemen, all thanks to the characteristics of blockchain technology—decentralization, immutability, and transparency. Stablecoins have seen remarkable growth over the last five years. For instance, USDT’s market capitalization skyrocketed from $4.6 billion in March 2020 to over $142 billion so far—the total stablecoin market cap surpassed $230 billion. This development shows the strong utility of the asset class in facilitating efficient transactions. However, to facilitate transactions seamlessly, stablecoins need liquidity. Digital payment infrastructure builders like MANSA are developing solutions to allow fast and flawless transactions across the world by providing on-chain liquidity. The key to enabling instant and transparent transactions, without any third parties like banks or payment networks, is by leveraging stablecoins and on-chain liquidity. The Nigerian business example would look different with stablecoins. The supplier from Nigeria can receive USDT from the buyer in Europe and instantly convert the funds into the local naira using MANSA’s on-chain liquidity pools. This way, the business owner wouldn’t need to pay the multi-layer fees and reduce the transaction delays to a minimum. Stablecoins and on-chain liquidity providers are already eliminating delays and transaction costs—the main issues that traditional finance has failed to achieve. Underserved markets are the biggest winners The real winners of stablecoin adoption are the underserved regions like Africa and Latin America. The net crypto imports of Brazil reached $12.9 billion in the first nine months of 2024, showing a 60.7% increase from the year before, according to a Reuters report . Notably, stablecoins accounted for nearly 70% of all crypto transactions in the country in 2024. The growth of USDT remittances and crypto-to-fiat on-ramps in emerging markets is proof that users prefer stable, on-chain payments over traditional banking rails. Regulators and policymakers should view stablecoins and on-chain liquidity as the solution since they reduce the systemic friction in payments, bank the underserved, and are more efficient for remittances. Stablecoins and the future of global payments Despite their growing adoption, stablecoins and on-chain liquidity providers are not here to replace traditional financial institutions—they are here to improve them. The future of payments is about flexibility, speed, and accessibility. Financial institutions, payment services, and businesses are already integrating stablecoins into their payment flows. Last year, Wise became the first foreign company to gain access to Japan’s bank payment clearing network, Zengin. This allowed the company to significantly reduce cross-border transaction fees by eliminating the intermediary banks. The shift from traditional finance to stablecoins is not speculative—it’s happening now as the demand for transparent, low-cost, and seamless global transactions increases. The rise of on-chain liquidity would potentially decline the reliance on outdated banking systems. Read more: The clock is ticking: Europe’s last chance to launch a euro stablecoin | Opinion Author: Mouloukou Sanoh Mouloukou Sanoh is a serial entrepreneur and investor integrating web3 innovations in emerging markets. He is the co-founder and CEO of MANSA, a liquidity solutions provider for short-term receivables, and previously co-founded Cassava Network, a leading African web3 platform. A Forbes 30 Under 30 (2023) nominee, he has also held roles as an Investment Manager at Adaverse and Founder of Mansa Capital, advising African companies on fundraising and strategy. With experience in private equity, banking, and web3, Mouloukou has led African initiatives at Everest Ventures Group and worked as a TMT Research Analyst in China. He holds a degree in Contemporary China Studies from the Chinese University of Hong Kong and has studied at Peking University. His global perspective is shaped by time in China, Hong Kong, Guinea, the Netherlands, and Belgium.

title: How to File a Claim Against Terraform Labs: Portal Opens March 31
body: Terraform Labs launches claims process for UST creditors; deadline April 30 Register via claims.terra.money with proof of ownership before deadline Recovery is not guaranteed; payouts are pro rata based on available assets Bankrupt firm Terraform Labs has launched a claims process to address creditor losses from the failed TerraUSD (UST) stablecoin collapse. The official Crypto Loss Claims Portal opens March 31, 2025. Creditors must file claims before the strict April 30, 2025 deadline (11:59 p.m. Eastern Time). How Do Creditors File Claims? Meeting that deadline requires specific steps for claim submission. Claimants must first register via the official portal at claims.terra.money. Registration involves providing acceptable proof of asset ownership, such as signed blockchain transactions or read-only API keys from cryptocurrency exchanges. Finally, a completed Crypto Loss Claim Form with detailed documentation must be submitted through the portal before the cutoff to avoid forfeiture. Terraform Labs Creditors: The Crypto Loss Claims Portal is scheduled to open for submission of Crypto Loss Claims on March 31, 2025. Creditors may file Eligible Cry… The post How to File a Claim Against Terraform Labs: Portal Opens March 31 appeared first on Coin Edition .

title: Relief for Crypto.com: SEC Ends Probe in Favorable Turn for Crypto Regulation
body: In a significant win for the cryptocurrency industry, and particularly for the popular exchange Crypto.com, the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has reportedly concluded its investigation into Crypto.com without pursuing any enforcement actions. This news, first reported by Eleanor Terrett of Crypto In America on X, citing sources familiar with the matter, marks a pivotal moment amidst ongoing regulatory scrutiny in the crypto space. Let’s delve into what this means for Crypto.com, the broader implications for crypto regulation US , and what could be on the horizon. Crypto.com SEC Probe Ends: What Does This Mean? The news that the Crypto.com SEC probe has concluded without any charges is undoubtedly a positive development for the platform and its users. Here’s a breakdown of the key events leading up to this outcome: Wells Notice Received: Back in October, Crypto.com received a Wells notice from the SEC. A Wells notice is essentially a notification that the SEC is planning to recommend enforcement action against the recipient. This can be a worrying sign for any company, especially in the heavily regulated financial sector. Preemptive Lawsuit: In a bold move, Crypto.com decided to take the offensive. They preemptively sued the SEC, arguing that the regulator was overstepping its authority. This was an unusual step, signaling a strong stance against the SEC’s scrutiny. Lawsuit Dropped: Interestingly, Crypto.com dropped the lawsuit in December. This coincided with President Donald Trump’s announcement of Paul Atkins, known for his crypto-friendly stance, as his pick for SEC chair. This timing suggests a potential shift in strategy or perhaps a signal of behind-the-scenes developments. Investigation Concluded: Now, months later, the news breaks that the SEC has indeed ended its SEC investigation crypto without taking any enforcement action. This indicates that after their inquiry, the SEC did not find sufficient grounds to pursue charges against Crypto.com. This conclusion offers a sense of relief to Crypto.com and could be interpreted as a validation of their operational practices. It also raises questions about the SEC’s approach to crypto regulation and whether this could signal a change in their enforcement strategy. Why is SEC Crypto Regulation So Critical? The role of the SEC in regulating the cryptocurrency industry is a topic of intense debate and scrutiny. Understanding why SEC crypto regulation is considered so important is crucial to grasping the significance of this development. Here are some key reasons: Aspect Importance of SEC Regulation Investor Protection The SEC’s primary mandate is to protect investors. In the volatile crypto market, this is paramount. Regulation aims to prevent fraud, market manipulation, and ensure fair practices, safeguarding individuals and institutions investing in digital assets. Market Integrity Regulation fosters trust and integrity in the crypto market. Clear rules and oversight can help establish a level playing field, encourage institutional adoption, and reduce the risks associated with unregulated markets. Compliance and Legitimacy Regulatory frameworks provide guidelines for crypto businesses to operate legally and compliantly. This legitimacy is essential for the long-term growth and mainstream acceptance of cryptocurrencies. Financial Stability As the crypto market becomes increasingly interconnected with traditional finance, regulators like the SEC are concerned about potential systemic risks. Regulation aims to mitigate these risks and maintain overall financial stability. However, the debate often revolves around finding the right balance between regulation and innovation. Overly strict or unclear regulations can stifle growth and push innovation overseas. The crypto industry often argues for clearer guidelines and a more collaborative approach from regulators. Crypto Compliance: A Victory and a Continuing Journey For Crypto.com, the end of the SEC probe without enforcement action can be seen as a significant win in their crypto compliance journey. It suggests that their efforts to adhere to regulatory standards, even amidst uncertainty, have been effective. But what are the broader takeaways regarding compliance in the crypto world? Proactive Compliance is Key: Crypto.com’s proactive approach, even considering the preemptive lawsuit (though later dropped), demonstrates the importance of taking compliance seriously from the outset. Engaging with regulators and demonstrating a commitment to legal frameworks is crucial. Navigating Regulatory Uncertainty: The crypto regulatory landscape is still evolving. Companies must be prepared to navigate ambiguity and adapt to changing rules. This requires robust legal and compliance teams, and a willingness to engage in constructive dialogue with regulatory bodies. Reputational Boost: Successfully navigating a regulatory investigation and emerging without enforcement action can significantly enhance a company’s reputation. It signals to users, investors, and partners that the platform is operating responsibly and transparently. Ongoing Scrutiny: While this particular probe has ended, it’s unlikely to be the end of regulatory scrutiny for Crypto.com or the crypto industry as a whole. Crypto compliance news is a constantly evolving space, and continuous vigilance and adaptation are essential. US Crypto Regulation Landscape: What’s Next? The conclusion of the Crypto.com probe occurs within a larger context of evolving US crypto regulation . The appointment of a crypto-friendly SEC chair, as suggested by the mention of Paul Atkins, could potentially signal a shift in the regulatory approach. What might we expect to see in the near future? Increased Clarity: The crypto industry has long called for clearer regulatory guidelines. A more crypto-friendly leadership at the SEC could lead to the development of more specific and practical rules for digital asset businesses. Balanced Approach: A shift could mean a move towards a more balanced approach, one that encourages innovation while still protecting investors and maintaining market integrity. This might involve more collaboration with the industry and a focus on fostering responsible growth. Continued Enforcement: It’s important to note that even with a potentially more favorable regulatory environment, enforcement will likely remain a key aspect of the SEC’s role. Areas like fraud, market manipulation, and unregistered securities offerings will continue to be targets of regulatory action. Global Harmonization: The US regulatory landscape is also influenced by global trends. Efforts towards international harmonization of crypto regulations could become more prominent, aiming to create a more consistent and predictable global market. Navigating Crypto Investigation: Key Insights For crypto companies, the Crypto.com situation offers valuable lessons on how to navigate potential regulatory investigations. While each case is unique, here are some actionable insights: Build a Strong Compliance Framework: Invest in robust compliance programs from the outset. This includes KYC/AML procedures, security measures, and legal expertise. Engage with Regulators: Maintain open communication with regulatory bodies. Seek clarification on rules and be proactive in addressing any concerns. Seek Expert Legal Counsel: Engage experienced legal counsel specializing in crypto regulation. They can provide guidance, navigate investigations, and represent your interests effectively. Transparency is Crucial: Operate with transparency and be prepared to provide information to regulators when requested. Be Prepared for Scrutiny: Regulatory scrutiny is a reality in the crypto space. Be prepared for potential investigations and develop a plan for how to respond. In conclusion, the SEC’s decision to end its probe into Crypto.com without enforcement is a welcome sign for the company and the broader crypto market. It underscores the ongoing evolution of crypto regulation and the importance of proactive compliance. While the regulatory landscape remains dynamic, this development offers a glimmer of optimism and suggests a potentially more balanced approach to overseeing the burgeoning digital asset industry. The journey of crypto investigation and compliance is far from over, but this episode provides valuable lessons and a sense of cautious optimism for the future. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action.

title: Crypto Trader Says Ethereum Rival Offering Opportunity at Current Levels – But There’s a Catch
body: A popular crypto strategist is leaning bullish on one Ethereum ( ETH ) rival, suggesting the altcoin has reached a market bottom. Pseudonymous trader Altcoin Sherpa tells his 242,800 followers on the social media platform X that Sonic ( S ) may be on the verge of breaking out after bouncing off of the 25-day Exponential Moving Average (EMA). Traders look at the EMA to determine whether an asset’s price is in an uptrend or not. If the price remains above the EMA, then the asset is likely going to remain bullish. However, he warns that an S uptrend may depend on whether Bitcoin ( BTC ) stays trading around its current price level. Bitcoin is trading for $87,300 at time of writing. “I still think that S is a pretty good buy around these levels. I think this legs up as long as BTC is stable. Still a lot of activity on this chain and a bunch of things going for it.” Source: Altcoin Sherpa/X Sonic is trading for $0.60 at time of writing, flat on the day. Next up, the trader says that the artificial intelligence (AI)-based meme asset Fartcoin ( FARTCOIN ) may first decline to the Fibonacci retracement level at $0.47 before breaking out. However, he says Fartcoin may break out without retesting lower price targets. “Fartcoin is either consolidating for the next leg or going to be a great buy at $0.47 or something. I don’t know which it is. I’m still in it on a spot trade and will continue watching.” Source: Altcoin Sherpa/X Fartcoin is trading for $0.55 at time of writing, down 1% in the last 24 hours. title: Arctic Pablo’s Final Call at Crystal Cove — SPX6900 Flips Wall Street and AI Prophecy Goes Cinematic
body: Markets are heating up. Meme coins are staging their comeback tour with explosive momentum. With fresh U.S. economic data causing SERP volatility and retail-driven microcaps surging across the crypto landscape, it’s prime time to snag hidden gems before they go viral. This week, three meme coins capture all the buzz: Arctic Pablo Coin , SPX6900, and Act I: The AI Prophecy. title: Understanding the Volatility of Cryptocurrency Markets
body: Cryptocurrency markets are known for their sharp price swings. Prices can rise or fall dramatically within short periods. Some investors see this as an opportunity, while others view it as a risk. Knowing why these price movements happen will help cryptocurrency users make smarter moves regarding their investments in digital assets. What is Cryptocurrency Volatility? Volatility refers to how much an asset's price changes over time. In cryptocurrency, this means how quickly and by how much a coin’s value rises or falls. Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other digital currencies often experience large price swings due to speculation, liquidity, and global economic conditions. How Volatile Are Cryptocurrencies Compared to Traditional Assets? Cryptocurrencies are far more unpredictable than traditional assets like stocks or fiat currencies. For example, Bitcoin’s volatility often hits 60% to 100% on its Historical Volatility Index (BVOL), compared to the S&P 500’s steadier 15% to 20%. This was clear in 2021 when Bitcoin crashed from $64,000 to $30,000 in just a few weeks. What Causes Cryptocurrency Volatility? Cryptocurrency prices can change quickly due to various factors. Market speculation, government regulations, liquidity, technological updates, and economic conditions all play a role in these price swings. Market Sentiment and Speculation Public perception plays a big role in cryptocurrency prices. Positive news, such as companies investing in Bitcoin, often leads to price increases. Negative headlines, like government crackdowns, can cause prices to drop. Market Liquidity and Trading Volume Liquidity affects how easily an asset can be bought or sold without shifting its price. Bitcoin’s liquidity, for example, helps reduce extreme price swings compared to smaller cryptocurrencies. Technological Developments and Security Issues Blockchain upgrades, security breaches, and major hacks significantly affect cryptocurrency prices by shaping investor confidence. Positive developments, like faster or smarter blockchain technology, boost trust and demand. However, when a big hack or breach hits, it shakes faith in crypto’s safety and usually paves the way for panic sales that crash prices fast. How to Manage Cryptocurrency Volatility Cryptocurrency prices can change quickly, but there are ways to manage the risk. Using different strategies can help reduce losses and make smarter investment decisions. Diversification Investing in multiple assets reduces exposure to extreme price movements in any single cryptocurrency. By spreading funds across various coins, investors can cushion the blow if one asset crashes unexpectedly. Holding Long-Term (HODLing) Some investors focus on long-term growth rather than reacting to short-term price changes. Bitcoin has gone through many boom-and-bust cycles but has continued to recover over time. Using Stablecoins Stablecoins like USDT (Tether) help reduce risk during market fluctuations. Their value is tied to traditional currencies which makes them less volatile. By offering a buffer against extreme price swings, stablecoins can increase confidence in the broader cryptocurrency ecosystem. Avoiding Emotional Decisions Making impulsive trades based on fear or hype often leads to losses. Staying informed and relying on research helps avoid costly mistakes. For instance, panic-selling during a sudden price drop might lock in losses, while buying into a hyped-up coin at its peak could mean overpaying. Will Cryptocurrency Volatility Change in the Future? Factors such as growing institutional involvement, the establishment of regulatory frameworks, and advancements in blockchain technology could collectively contribute to greater price stability. While the future remains uncertain, these developments offer a plausible foundation for a less volatile market over time. Institutional Investment The increasing participation of large financial institutions in cryptocurrency markets could serve as a stabilizing force over the long term. Over time, a greater institutional presence may foster a more structured trading environment. Technology and Market Growth As blockchain technology improves, transactions could become more efficient and secure. Wider adoption of cryptocurrency in everyday transactions may also help stabilize prices over time. Cryptocurrencies such as Tron and Ripple have experienced increased adoption, particularly as they have gained traction in the online casino industry. Players who like playing online slots or betting on sports appreciate their fast transactions and low fees, which led to greater adoption of these cryptocurrencies. Regulatory Developments Governments are exploring policies such as anti-money laundering rules or exchange oversight that could provide a more secure and predictable landscape for investors. By establishing boundaries, such measures may encourage broader participation and reduce the sharp price drops tied to sudden legal or policy shocks. Final Thoughts Cryptocurrency volatility creates both risks and opportunities. Large price swings can happen quickly, often influenced by speculation, regulations , and global economic conditions. Investors who understand these factors can make better decisions and reduce unnecessary risk. Disclaimer: This is a sponsored article and is for informational purposes only. It does not reflect the views of Crypto Daily, nor is it intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, or financial advice.

title: Analyst Says Cardano (ADA) Is Stuck in a Channel. Here’s the Significance
body: Cardano (ADA) is currently trading within a defined price channel, with analysts closely monitoring for a decisive breakout or breakdown. Crypto analyst Ali recently highlighted this pattern in a post on X, noting that ADA’s next major move will be triggered by a breakout above $0.77 or a breakdown below $0.69. This range-bound movement has caught the attention of traders, as it signals a critical inflection point for the asset’s price trajectory. Cardano’s Price Channel: What It Means When an asset is “stuck in a channel,” it means that its price oscillates between two well-defined support and resistance levels without making a significant move in either direction. In this case, Cardano is currently bound between $0.69 and $0.77, with neither buyers nor sellers taking full control of the market. This period of consolidation typically precedes a larger movement, and traders are watching closely to determine which direction ADA will take next. #Cardano $ADA is stuck in a channel. The next major move will be triggered by a breakout above $0.77 or a breakdown below $0.69. pic.twitter.com/50GTW1fnGw — Ali (@ali_charts) March 27, 2025 Ali’s analysis underscores that a breakout above $0.77 could serve as a bullish catalyst, potentially leading to further upside momentum. On the other hand, a drop below $0.69 may trigger bearish sentiment, putting ADA at risk of further declines. This makes the coming days crucial for Cardano, as the resolution of this channel could define its short-term price trend. Market Sentiment and Technical Outlook Cardano’s recent price behavior aligns with broader market trends, where major cryptocurrencies have been experiencing consolidation phases before decisive moves. The current structure suggests that traders are waiting for confirmation before entering positions, making volume and momentum key factors to watch. A breakout above the resistance level could see ADA targeting higher levels , possibly testing psychological price zones such as $0.80 and beyond. If the price breaks below the support level, however, it could lead to increased selling pressure, bringing ADA closer to the $0.65 range or lower. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 Key Factors to Watch Several factors could influence which direction Cardano moves: Bitcoin and Market Trends: Given the correlation between ADA and the broader crypto market, movements in Bitcoin (BTC) could impact ADA’s price action. A bullish trend in BTC could support an ADA breakout, while a downturn could reinforce bearish pressure. Development and Adoption: Cardano’s ecosystem continues to expand, with growing interest in its smart contract capabilities and partnerships. Any major announcements regarding network upgrades or institutional adoption could positively influence price action. Investor Sentiment: A surge in trading volume and on-chain activity could provide insight into whether market participants expect an upward breakout or a downward move. Cardano’s current position within this trading channel highlights the importance of technical levels in determining its next move. As Ali pointed out, a breakout above $0.77 or a breakdown below $0.69 will dictate ADA’s short-term direction. Traders and investors should keep a close eye on price action, volume trends, and broader market conditions to anticipate the next major move. With Cardano at a pivotal point, its next breakout could set the stage for either a strong rally or a deeper correction. title: Explosive Growth: Tokenized Gold Market Cap Rockets to a Record $1.4 Billion
body: Hold onto your hats, crypto enthusiasts! The world of tokenized assets just witnessed a monumental surge. Buckle up as we dive into the electrifying news: the tokenized gold market cap has just smashed through all previous records, reaching an astounding $1.4 billion in March! This landmark achievement signals a growing appetite for digital representations of precious metals and underscores the increasing maturity of the cryptocurrency space. Let’s explore what’s driving this gold rush in the digital age. Tokenized Gold Market Cap Soars to Unprecedented Heights The numbers don’t lie – they scream success! According to CoinDesk’s latest monthly stablecoin report, the total tokenized gold market cap has officially peaked at a remarkable $1.4 billion. This milestone, achieved in March, highlights the burgeoning interest in digital assets backed by physical commodities. Leading the charge are two titans in the tokenized gold arena: Tether Gold (XAUT) and PAX Gold (PAXG). These two tokens alone account for the vast majority of the market, with XAUT commanding a hefty $749 million and PAXG following closely with $653 million. This dominance underscores their established reputation and investor confidence in these platforms. But the story doesn’t end with market capitalization. Trading activity is also reaching fever pitch. The report reveals that tokenized gold trading volume hit a year-high of $1.6 billion in the same month. This surge in trading volume further validates the increasing liquidity and acceptance of tokenized gold within the crypto market. It signifies that investors are not just holding these assets; they are actively trading them, indicating a healthy and dynamic market. Tokenized Gold Asset Market Cap (USD) Tether Gold (XAUT) $749 Million PAX Gold (PAXG) $653 Million Total Market Cap $1.4 Billion What’s Igniting the Tokenized Gold Price Rally? So, what’s the secret ingredient fueling this impressive growth in the tokenized gold sector? Experts point to a significant factor: the recent surge in the price of physical gold itself. As traditional gold prices reached all-time highs, investors naturally looked for ways to capitalize on this upward trend. Tokenized gold offers a compelling and efficient avenue to do just that. The CoinDesk report suggests a direct correlation between the physical gold rally and the increased interest in its tokenized counterparts. When traditional gold shines, so does its digital twin! Think about it: as economic uncertainties loom and inflationary pressures mount, gold has historically been considered a safe haven asset. This reputation extends to tokenized gold , which inherits the inherent value and stability associated with the precious metal. In times of market volatility, investors often flock to gold as a store of value, and tokenized gold provides a modern, accessible, and easily tradable way to gain exposure to this timeless asset. Why Choose Tokenized Gold? Unveiling the Benefits Why are investors increasingly turning to tokenized gold over traditional gold investments? The answer lies in a compelling mix of benefits that cater to the modern investor: Fractional Ownership: Forget about buying whole gold bars! Tokenized gold allows you to own fractions of gold, making it accessible to investors of all sizes. You can invest with as little as you want, democratizing access to gold ownership. Ease of Trading: Trading tokenized gold is as simple as trading any other cryptocurrency. It’s available 24/7 on crypto exchanges, offering unparalleled liquidity and flexibility compared to traditional gold markets with their limited trading hours. Lower Storage Costs: Say goodbye to expensive and cumbersome gold storage solutions! Tokenized gold eliminates the need for physical storage, reducing costs and simplifying the investment process. The gold backing the tokens is securely stored by the issuing company. Portfolio Diversification: Tokenized gold offers a fantastic way to diversify your crypto portfolio and even your broader investment portfolio. It provides a hedge against market volatility and inflation, adding a layer of stability to your holdings. Transparency and Auditability: Reputable tokenized gold providers ensure transparency by regularly auditing their gold reserves. This provides investors with confidence that each token is truly backed by physical gold. Navigating the Tokenized Gold Landscape: Key Considerations While the allure of tokenized gold is undeniable, it’s crucial to approach this market with informed awareness. Here are some key considerations for potential investors: Issuer Reputation: Not all tokenized gold is created equal. Thoroughly research the issuer of the token. Look for established and reputable companies with a proven track record of transparency and secure gold storage. XAUT and PAXG, for instance, are issued by well-known and regulated entities. Redemption Process: Understand the redemption process. Can you easily redeem your tokens for physical gold if desired? What are the fees and procedures involved? Clarity on redemption is vital. Regulatory Landscape: The regulatory landscape for tokenized assets is still evolving. Stay informed about any regulatory developments that could impact the tokenized gold market in your jurisdiction. Security: While tokenized gold eliminates physical storage concerns, digital security is paramount. Use secure wallets and follow best practices for cryptocurrency security to protect your holdings. Seize the Golden Opportunity in the Digital Age The surge in the tokenized gold market cap to a record $1.4 billion is more than just a number; it’s a powerful indicator of the evolving financial landscape. It signifies the growing acceptance of digital assets, the enduring appeal of gold as a store of value, and the innovative ways in which technology is democratizing access to traditional investments. As the price of gold continues to be volatile and the crypto market matures, tokenized gold stands poised to play an increasingly significant role in the portfolios of savvy investors. This explosive growth story is just beginning, and the potential for tokenized gold to reshape the future of precious metal investment is undeniably golden. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action.

title: According to Famous CEO, Bitcoin Bullishness Is Not Over! He Said Target Is $150,000 For The End Of The Year, Explained His Reasons!
body: While the leading cryptocurrency Bitcoin continues to quietly recover after the sharp declines it has experienced, the price is still below $90,000. While the BTC price is still unable to surpass the $88,000 resistance as it approaches the end of the first quarter, rally expectations continue for the rest of 2025. At this point, Nigel Green, CEO of deVere Group, one of the world's largest financial consultancy firms, said that Bitcoin will reach a big six-figure target of $150,000 by the end of the year. Green said that Bitcoin could rise and reach $150,000 with the support given by US President Donald Trump to cryptocurrencies. Green also noted that Trump's tariff policies could lead to macroeconomic uncertainties and push investors to move their assets to safe havens. According to the CEO, some investors will view BTC as digital gold and invest their assets in BTC, which will support its rise. “Bitcoin has the opportunity to perform incredibly well. Trump’s support for crypto will support BTC. But Trump's tariff uncertainty is creating some chaos, leaving many people worried about what will happen in emerging markets and other countries. Of course, when there is uncertainty, more and more people invest in gold. But at some point, gold investors also want an alternative, and Bitcoin offers that alternative. With Trump's support, my goal for Bitcoin by the end of the year is $150,000.” *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: According to Famous CEO, Bitcoin Bullishness Is Not Over! He Said Target Is $150,000 For The End Of The Year, Explained His Reasons!

title: Analyst Predicts 72,500% XRP Rocket Price Rally After Spotting This Bullish Flag
body: Steph Is Crypto (@Steph_iscrypto), a cryptocurrency analyst, recently shared a bold projection regarding XRP’s future price. Posting a chart on X, the analyst suggested that the digital asset could reach an astonishing $1,452.81. The chart highlights a bull flag pattern, a technical formation often associated with continued upward momentum after consolidation. #XRP TO $1,452.81 DO YOU BELIEVE ME? pic.twitter.com/U8Dzu52Cf2 — STEPH IS CRYPTO (@Steph_iscrypto) March 26, 2025 The Bull Flag Formation and Its Implications The chart shared by Steph illustrates a prolonged consolidation phase following a strong upward price movement. This pattern, referred to as a bull flag, is characterized by a steep price surge (the flagpole) followed by a rectangular consolidation period (the flag). Technical analysts often interpret this formation as a sign of a potential breakout, leading to another significant price increase. The chart marks XRP’s price movement over the past several years, showing its rise in 2017 to its all-time high in early 2018. This remarkable rally formed the flagpole, and the asset experienced a multi-year consolidation after this, trading within a downward-sloping channel that formed the flag. According to the analyst, the breakout from this formation signals the start of an aggressive price surge. The digital asset’s recent price surge, which began in November after former SEC Chair Gary Gensler announced his resignation , caused its price to break out of this 7-year flag, beginning its journey to $1,452.81. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 A Lofty XRP Price Target Steph’s projection of $1,452.81 per XRP is significantly higher than its all-time high of around $3.84, recorded in early 2018. While some traders view the bull flag breakout as a bullish indicator, the magnitude of this price target raises skepticism. The digital asset is currently trading at $2.3, and a climb to Steph’s target would require a surge of over 63,000%. XRP’s market capitalization would need unprecedented levels to support such a valuation. While many in the community see this as a barrier, some experts have shown that the market cap problem is a myth and won’t hinder the digital asset’s growth. Market Factors and Expectations While technical analysis can provide insights into potential price movements, broader market factors help determine XRP’s trajectory. The recent dismissal of the legal battle between Ripple and the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has excited the community, as many experts expect this move to give the asset a significant boost. While a four-digit target is ambitious, the digital asset is in a good position to experience this massive surge, and the end of the lawsuit makes it more realistic. title: WCT’s Role in the Onchain Economy
body: Every interaction in the onchain ecosystem starts with a wallet. Whether signing transactions, managing assets, or accessing apps, wallets serve as the critical gateway to digital ownership. But a wallet alone isn’t enough. It needs a way to connect, communicate, and function without friction across an expanding ecosystem, from gaming, finance, marketplaces, social and payments. This is where WalletConnect comes in. More than just a communications network, WalletConnect is the foundation for onchain interactions, ensuring wallets can operate securely, reliably, and at scale. As onchain activity grows, so does the need for decentralized, efficient, and permissionless connectivity. If you have engaged with the onchain economy you have used the WalletConnect Network. Wallets and WalletConnect: The Invisible Infrastructure Since its inception, WalletConnect has served as the backbone of onchain connectivity. Originally an open-source protocol for connecting wallets to apps, it has evolved into an essential piece of infrastructure. Today, WalletConnect enables millions of wallet connections, supporting everything from finance and digital assets to gaming and enterprise applications. Wallets rely on WalletConnect to establish secure connections, enable multi-chain interactions, and improve UX with transaction signing and execution. The WalletConnect Network is taking this a step further by decentralizing how connections are made, ensuring that no single entity controls the flow of transactions between wallets and apps. This shift is necessary as onchain activity scales, relying on centralized relays is not a sustainable path forward. The Role of WCT: From Past to Future What It Was Since its inception, WalletConnect has played a critical role in the onchain economy but it lacked a mechanism to sustain itself independently. The WalletConnect Token (WCT) was introduced to make decentralization possible, moving beyond a centralized model to a network where incentives drive participation. What It Is Today, WCT powers the WalletConnect Network by enabling network participation, governance, and long-term sustainability. Node operators earn WCT for relaying messages, ensuring decentralized and censorship-resistant connections. Token holders shape the evolution of WalletConnect’s infrastructure, ensuring the network remains aligned with the needs of the ecosystem. WCT also establishes an economic model that incentivizes developers, wallets, and apps to contribute to the network’s growth. What It Will Become The vision for WCT extends beyond what exists today. Over time, it will expand participation, bringing more wallets, apps, and relayers into the ecosystem, beyond the already huge adoption WalletConnect has seen. It will enable additional use cases, such as staking, reputation systems, and service-level guarantees for network reliability. As the WalletConnect Network matures, WCT will be the foundation for ensuring that wallets and apps remain interoperable without reliance on centralized systems. Underlying Infrastructure of Onchain Connectivity Wallet infrastructure is often overlooked, but without it, the onchain ecosystem would not function. As the industry moves toward an onchain-first future, WalletConnect is cementing itself as the essential connectivity layer, ensuring wallets remain the entry point for billions of users. The WalletConnect Network, powered by WCT, is more than a network, it is the next phase of decentralized infrastructure, designed to meet the demands of the next era of onchain applications. Every wallet connection, every signed transaction, every seamless app interaction reinforces this vision. With WCT, the network moves beyond reliance on a single entity, ensuring it remains permissionless, scalable, and sustainable. This is the path forward: to become the underlying infrastructure of connectivity. This content is sponsored and does not serve as an endorsement by Blockworks. title: Senator Bernie Moreno calls former SEC Chair Gary Gensler “one of the stupidest people in government”
body: Senator Bernie Moreno has criticized former SEC Chairman Gary Gensler, calling him “one of the stupidest people in government.” Senator Moreno made his remarks during a recent hearing while congratulating Paul Atkins for taking over from Gary Gensler. Moreno’s remarks added to ongoing debates within the crypto space regarding Gensler’s tenure at the SEC, many of whom felt he was overly aggressive and misaligned with the needs of the growing digital asset market. Gensler’s departure symbolized the end of what the crypto community saw as an unnecessarily combative relationship between the SEC and the crypto industry. Moreno calls Gensler one of the stupidest people in government Today in the Senate hearing Senator Bernie Moreno says former SEC Chair Gary Gensler "was one of the stupidest people in government." pic.twitter.com/0W2BUWssZd — MartyParty (@martypartymusic) March 28, 2025 Senator Bernie Moreno, who gained attention for defeating Elizabeth Warren’s anti-crypto efforts in Ohio, said that former SEC Chair Gary Gensler was “one of the stupidest people in government.” Senator Moreno made the comment during a recent hearing, where he was addressing Paul Atkins. “Man, you just have to be able to breathe and not be a complete raging lunatic, and you’re going to be the greatest SEC (chair) compared to the last guy. Congratulations on coming after Gary Gensler who, objectively, probably, was one of the stupidest people in government.” -Bernie Moreno, The U.S. Senator of Ohio President Donald Trump said last year that he would fire Gensler on his first day in office once he was elected. Gensler decided to step down and announced his resignation in November after Trump won the elections. Atkins has now been considered to lead the SEC as Gensler’s replacement. The former SEC chair faced criticism for his stance on cryptocurrency regulations, with Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse accusing the SEC of regulatory overreach. The price of Bitcoin also surged towards $100,000 after Gensler’s resignation, reflecting optimism about a potentially less stringent regulatory environment. The former SEC official expressed his pride in his accomplishment and noted, “The SEC’s mission to protect investors and maintain fair, orderly, and efficient markets has never been more important.” Democrats question whether Atkins fits the SEC Chair position Paul Atkins appeared before lawmakers along with Jonathan Gould, nominee for Controller of the Currency; Luke Petit, nominee for assistant treasury secretary for financial institutions; and Marc Molinaro, a former House member nominated to lead the Federal Transit Administration. The Senate Banking Committee Democrats noted Atkins’ previous positions and questioned whether he was the right person to take over the Securities and Exchange Commission. Senator Elizabeth Warren of Massachusetts criticized Atkins for his votes to “loosen the reins on big investment banks like Lehman Brothers and Bear Stearns” prior to the financial crisis in 2008. She asked Atkins about a vote he cast in 2004 to reduce capital buffers for both firms and his subsequent comments that the move had nothing to do with the market collapse. The SEC Chair nominee argued that many factors contributed to the financial crisis after Warren asked whether he was wrong. She said, “Mr. Atkins has an almost perfect track record,” referring to his SEC position from 2002 to 2008. Warren argued that “he got pretty much everything wrong in the run-up to the biggest financial crash since the Great Depression.” The politician stated that Atkin’s record didn’t deserve the SEC promotion. Senator from Georgia Raphael Warnock questioned whether Atkins believed overregulation contributed to the financial crash. The former SEC commissioner answered “I don’t know about overregulation, I think it was misregulation, frankly – wasted resources and not focused on the actual problems that were there.” He also acknowledged that regulation should be smart, effective and appropriately tailored within the confines of the regulator’s statutory authority. “In short, clear rules of the road benefit all market participants,” Atkins added. The SEC Chair nominee was also probed for potential conflicts of interest surrounding his post-SEC life. After leaving the SEC, Atkins established Patomak Global Partners, a company that specializes in financial strategy, risk management, and compliance. Senator Warren argued that if Atkins is confirmed, he will be in a prime spot to deliver for his clients, who have been paying him millions of dollars for years. The former SEC commissioner said that if confirmed, he would sell Patomak. Senate Banking Chair Tim Scott believes that Atkins will roll back the Biden administration’s disastrous practices and promote capital formation and retail investment opportunities. The politician also said that the SEC Chair nominee will provide long-overdue clarity for digital assets, which will ensure American innovation does not fall further behind. Cryptopolitan Academy: Coming Soon - A New Way to Earn Passive Income with DeFi in 2025. Learn More

title: Why is Bitcoin price down today?
body: Bitcoin’s ( BTC ) price has dropped by over 2.5% over the last 24 hours to $85,100 as Trump’s latest tariffs continue to put downward pressure on global markets and cryptocurrencies. BTC/USD daily chart. Source: Cointelegraph/ TradingView Key takeaways: Bitcoin’s drawdown follows US President Donald Trump’s announcement for automotive tariffs. Bitcoin drops alongside US equities amid strengthening correlation. Bearish BTC price calls emerge as trader sentiment sours. Bitcoin price declines with risk-on assets BTC’s ongoing price drop mirrors similar declines in the broader risk-on market due to unfavorable macroeconomic conditions. Key points: The crypto market’s combined market capitalization has dropped by over 2.6% in the last 24 hours, aligning with selloffs in US stocks. The S&P 500 dropped by 0.33% to close the day at 5,693.31 on March 27, while the Nasdaq composite index declined by 94 points (-0.53%). The Dow Jones index lost 0.37% to close the trading day on March 27 at 42,299.70. This is in response to President Trump’s announcement of a 25% tariff on all imported automobiles, effective April 2, 2025. Earlier in March, Trump imposed 25% tariffs on all goods from Mexico and Canada and 10% tariffs on Chinese imports. Canada and Mexico have announced intentions to impose retaliatory tariffs on US goods, escalating trade tensions and raising concerns about the impacts of a full-blown trade war. “Markets are expecting Trump’s April 2nd reciprocal tariffs day to be the end of uncertainty,” said capital market commentator The Kobeissi Letter in a March 26 post on X. Related: 'Bitcoin Macro Index' bear signal puts $110K BTC price return in doubt The Kobeissi Letter believes that “it will be the exact opposite,” with tech stocks losing over $400 billion over the past week. “The trade war is back.” 30-day performance of US tech stocks. Source: Financial Visualizations Bitcoin is viewed as a risk asset in the short term, often dropping when traditional markets falter. Bitcoin and top altcoins have historically declined during periods of economic turbulence, e.g., the COVID-19 sell-off in March 2020. As of March 28, the weekly correlation between BTC and US stocks was 0.88. Bitcoin and S&P 500’s weekly correlation. Source: Cointelegraph/ TradingView Bitcoin traders brace for BTC’s sub-$80K pullback Analyzing low-timeframe BTC price action, popular analyst AlphaBTC was slightly pessimistic about Bitcoin’s recovery in the short term. “Bitcoin is losing the weekly open” at $86,000, he wrote in part of an X post about the hourly chart. “Looks like $BTC has finally made up its mind and is heading to that monthly open and max pain for the options expiry.” BTC/USD hourly chart. Source: AlphaBTC AlphaBTC referred to the March 1 open at $84,300, which BTC price must hold to avoid ending the month in red and risk sinking deeper. Others recommended taking a longer-term view amid heightened volatility, with Bitcoin up a mere 1.6% in March at the time of writing. “BTC’s range breakdown and sweep might be a bit slower,” fellow trader Daan Crypto Trades said in part of his X post. This pullback is accompanied by the “sharpest equities sell-off since the Yen Carry Trade issues ,” he explained about BTC price action during the last range sweep in August 2024. According to Daan Crypto Trades, Bitcoin needs to reclaim $90,000 to confirm that the range sweep was “just a shakeout” since this area remains a key technical barrier. “Price will still be heavily influenced by headlines, and with the 2nd of April (Tariff/Liberation Day) approaching, volatility is a guarantee. Would not be surprised to hang around the mid-80Ks for a while until that blows over.” BTC/USD three-day chart. Source: Daan Crypto Trades More bearish predictions nonetheless came from those wary of the macro implications. Analyst and MN Capital founder Michael van de Poppe believes Bitcoin has started to “look slightly less good,” warning of a retest of the $78,000-$80,000 range if the support at $84,000 is lost. Trend remains to be upwards for $BTC , but it starts to look slightly less good. It's shaking. Drop sub $84K and I think we'll see a test at $78-80K and perhaps lower before we'll bounce back up. pic.twitter.com/nZaweAv9nv — Michaël van de Poppe (@CryptoMichNL) March 28, 2025 This article does not contain investment advice or recommendations. Every investment and trading move involves risk, and readers should conduct their own research when making a decision.

title: Urgent Alert: Upbit & Bithumb Flag HIFI as Closely Monitored Asset – Is Your Investment Safe?
body: Are you holding HIFI tokens? Pay close attention! South Korean crypto giants Upbit and Bithumb have just issued a critical warning, designating Hifi Finance (HIFI) as a closely monitored asset . This significant development has sent ripples of concern through the crypto community. What exactly does this mean for HIFI, and more importantly, what are the implications for investors like you? Why the Sudden HIFI Closely Monitored Asset Designation? Both Upbit and Bithumb, leading cryptocurrency exchanges in South Korea, released simultaneous announcements on their official platforms. The core reason behind the HIFI closely monitored asset label boils down to serious concerns regarding transparency and communication. Let’s break down the specific issues raised: Inadequate Disclosures: The exchanges cited a lack of sufficient information being shared by the Hifi Finance team. In the fast-paced world of crypto, consistent and clear communication is paramount for investor confidence. Lack of Transparency in Business Plan Changes: Cryptocurrency projects often evolve, but Upbit and Bithumb pointed to changes in Hifi Finance’s business plan that were not communicated transparently to the public. This opacity raises red flags about the project’s direction and stability. Uncertainties About Project Progress: Perhaps the most concerning point is the ambiguity surrounding the actual progress of the Hifi Finance project. Exchanges need to ensure that listed assets are actively developing and moving forward. Doubts about progress can erode investor trust. These factors collectively led Upbit and Bithumb to classify HIFI as a closely monitored asset , signaling a heightened level of risk associated with this cryptocurrency. What Does ‘Closely Monitored Asset’ Really Mean? Understanding Crypto Exchange Risks For those unfamiliar with exchange terminology, being labeled a ‘closely monitored asset’ is akin to receiving a yellow card in a soccer match. It’s a serious warning sign indicating that the exchange has concerns but hasn’t yet taken the drastic step of delisting. However, it’s crucial to understand the potential implications of such a designation, as it often precedes more severe actions. Here’s what the crypto exchange risks associated with a closely monitored asset status typically entail: Increased Volatility: News of a ‘closely monitored’ status often triggers market uncertainty. Investors may panic and sell off their holdings, leading to sharp price drops and increased price swings. Decreased Liquidity: As traders become wary, trading volume for the asset can decline. Reduced liquidity makes it harder to buy and sell HIFI at desired prices, potentially exacerbating losses. Potential Delisting: This is the ultimate risk. If the concerns raised by Upbit and Bithumb are not adequately addressed by Hifi Finance, or if new issues arise, delisting becomes a real possibility. Delisting from major exchanges significantly reduces accessibility and can severely impact the price of the asset. Think of it this way: exchanges are gatekeepers to the crypto market. When they raise alarms about an asset, it’s a signal investors shouldn’t ignore. The crypto exchange risks associated with closely monitored assets are substantial and demand careful consideration. Upbit and Bithumb’s Official HIFI Warning: A Closer Look To truly grasp the gravity of the situation, let’s examine excerpts from Upbit and Bithumb’s official announcements regarding the Upbit HIFI warning and Bithumb HIFI warning . Upbit’s Announcement Highlights: “We have designated Hifi Finance (HIFI) as an Investment Warning Coin… due to concerns about insufficient disclosure, changes in the business plan without prior notice, and uncertainty about project progress.” This statement clearly points to a lack of communication and transparency from the Hifi Finance team, raising doubts about the project’s operational integrity and future direction. Bithumb’s Announcement Echoes Similar Concerns: “Bithumb has designated Hifi Finance (HIFI) as an Investment Caution Item to protect investors… We have determined that there are circumstances that may cause investor caution due to issues such as lack of information disclosure and unclear project progress.” Bithumb’s emphasis on “protecting investors” underscores the seriousness of their concerns. Both exchanges are prioritizing user safety by flagging HIFI, urging investors to exercise extreme caution. South Korean Crypto Regulation and Exchange Scrutiny This situation unfolds within the context of increasingly stringent South Korean crypto regulation . South Korea has emerged as a major cryptocurrency market, and regulators are keen on ensuring investor protection and market stability. Exchanges in South Korea operate under close regulatory scrutiny and are expected to maintain high standards of due diligence when listing and monitoring digital assets. The proactive measures taken by Upbit and Bithumb to designate HIFI as a closely monitored asset reflect this regulatory environment. South Korean crypto regulation pushes exchanges to be vigilant and act swiftly when potential risks are identified. This incident serves as a reminder of the robust oversight in the South Korean crypto space and the importance of exchanges acting as responsible gatekeepers. What Should HIFI Holders Do Now? Actionable Steps & Investor Caution If you are currently holding HIFI tokens, it’s time to take this Upbit HIFI warning and Bithumb HIFI warning seriously. Here are some actionable steps you should consider: Stay Informed and Monitor Closely: Your first step should be to actively monitor official announcements from Upbit, Bithumb, and Hifi Finance itself. Pay attention to any statements, updates, or responses from the Hifi Finance team addressing the exchanges’ concerns. Assess Your Risk Tolerance: Evaluate your personal risk tolerance. Are you comfortable holding an asset flagged with such serious concerns? Consider the potential for further price drops and even delisting. Consider Reducing Exposure: Based on your risk assessment, you might want to consider reducing your HIFI holdings. This could involve selling a portion or all of your tokens to mitigate potential losses if the situation worsens. Diversify Your Portfolio: This is a fundamental principle of investing. Avoid concentrating your crypto portfolio in a single asset, especially one facing heightened risks. Diversification can cushion the impact of negative events affecting individual cryptocurrencies. Seek Professional Advice (If Needed): If you are uncertain about the best course of action, consider consulting with a financial advisor who understands the cryptocurrency market. Conclusion: Navigating Uncertainty in the Crypto Market The designation of Hifi Finance (HIFI) as a closely monitored asset by Upbit and Bithumb is a stark reminder of the inherent risks within the cryptocurrency market. It underscores the critical importance of transparency, communication, and regulatory compliance for crypto projects. For investors, this situation serves as a valuable lesson in vigilance, risk management, and the need to stay informed about the assets they hold. The future of HIFI remains uncertain, but the warnings from these major exchanges should not be taken lightly. Always conduct thorough research and exercise caution when navigating the volatile world of crypto investments. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action.

title: Shocking Move: GameStop Plunges $1.3B into Bitcoin – Genius or Gamble?
body: In a move that has sent ripples through both the gaming and cryptocurrency worlds, GameStop (GME), the meme stock icon, has announced a surprising foray into Bitcoin. The company plans to issue a staggering $1.3 billion in convertible bonds, with a portion of the proceeds earmarked for acquiring Bitcoin. But is this a strategic masterstroke or a risky gamble? Let’s dive into the details and dissect this intriguing development. GameStop’s Audacious Bitcoin Bet: Unpacking the Convertible Bonds GameStop, known for its brick-and-mortar video game retail and its dramatic stock saga, is venturing into the digital asset realm. The company revealed its intention to issue $1.3 billion worth of convertible bonds. These aren’t your typical bonds; they can be converted into GameStop shares at a predetermined price in the future. The key takeaway here is that GameStop aims to use a portion of this massive capital infusion to invest in Bitcoin . This marks a significant shift for a company primarily associated with physical retail, signaling a potential pivot towards digital assets and diversifying its treasury strategy. Here’s a breakdown of what convertible bonds are and why GameStop might be using them: Convertible Bonds Explained: These are debt securities that can be converted into equity (stock) at a specific conversion ratio and price. They offer investors the potential upside of stock appreciation while providing the downside protection of a bond. Why Convertible Bonds for GameStop? Raise Capital: Issuing bonds is a way for companies to raise substantial capital without immediately diluting existing shareholders (unlike issuing new stock directly). Lower Interest Rates: Convertible bonds often carry lower interest rates compared to traditional bonds because of the embedded conversion option, making them attractive for issuers. Attract Investors: They can attract a broader range of investors who are interested in both fixed income and potential equity upside. Bitcoin Investment Rationale: While GameStop hasn’t explicitly stated the exact percentage of bond proceeds for Bitcoin , the intention is clear. This move could be driven by several factors: Diversification: Bitcoin offers diversification beyond traditional assets and could potentially act as a hedge against inflation. Yield Generation: Depending on the strategy, GameStop might explore yield-generating opportunities within the crypto investment space. Brand Image: Embracing Bitcoin could be seen as a move to modernize GameStop’s image and appeal to a tech-savvy audience. Investor Sentiment Rollercoaster: GME Stock’s Wild Ride Post-Announcement The market reaction to GameStop’s Bitcoin announcement has been anything but predictable. Initially, GME stock experienced an 11% surge in after-hours trading, fueled by the excitement surrounding the crypto venture. However, this initial enthusiasm proved short-lived. The stock quickly reversed course, plummeting a dramatic 24% to reach its lowest point of the year at $21.46. This volatile swing underscores the mixed investor sentiment surrounding GameStop’s strategic shift. Let’s examine the factors contributing to this turbulent market response: Positive Reactions Negative Reactions Innovation Perception: Some investors might view the Bitcoin move as innovative and forward-thinking, signaling GameStop’s willingness to adapt to the evolving digital landscape. Potential for High Returns: Believers in Bitcoin ‘s long-term growth potential might see this as a shrewd investment that could significantly boost GameStop’s balance sheet in the future. Strategic Diversification: Diversifying into a new asset class like Bitcoin could be perceived as a prudent risk management strategy. Core Business Concerns: Skeptics might question whether investing in Bitcoin distracts from addressing the fundamental challenges facing GameStop’s core retail business in a rapidly digitizing gaming market. Stock Dilution Fears: The issuance of convertible bonds inherently implies potential stock dilution in the future when bondholders convert their bonds into shares, which can negatively impact existing shareholders. Bitcoin Volatility: Bitcoin is known for its price volatility. Investors might be concerned about GameStop exposing itself to this risk, especially given the company’s past financial struggles. Lack of Crypto Expertise: Questions arise about GameStop’s expertise in managing crypto investment and navigating the complexities of the digital asset market. Navigating the Crypto Seas: Benefits and Challenges for GameStop GameStop’s foray into Bitcoin presents both exciting opportunities and significant hurdles. The success of this venture will hinge on careful execution and a clear strategy. Let’s weigh the potential benefits against the inherent challenges. Potential Benefits: First-Mover Advantage in Gaming Retail: GameStop could position itself as a pioneer in the gaming retail sector by embracing cryptocurrency, potentially attracting a new wave of crypto-savvy customers and partners. Enhanced Treasury Management: Bitcoin could offer an alternative to holding large cash reserves, potentially generating better returns and acting as a hedge against inflation. New Revenue Streams: Beyond simply holding Bitcoin , GameStop could explore integrating crypto into its business model, such as accepting Bitcoin as payment, offering crypto-related products or services, or even exploring NFTs and blockchain gaming initiatives in the future. Increased Brand Visibility and Buzz: The Bitcoin move has undoubtedly generated significant media attention and could revitalize GameStop’s brand image, attracting a younger, digitally native demographic. Challenges and Risks: Market Volatility: The inherent volatility of Bitcoin poses a significant risk. A sharp downturn in the crypto market could negatively impact GameStop’s balance sheet and GME stock price. Regulatory Uncertainty: The regulatory landscape for cryptocurrencies is still evolving and varies across jurisdictions. Changes in regulations could impact GameStop’s Bitcoin strategy. Operational Complexity: Managing crypto investment , ensuring security, and complying with regulations require specialized expertise and infrastructure, which GameStop may need to develop or acquire. Investor Skepticism: As evidenced by the stock price reaction, not all investors are convinced of the wisdom of this move. GameStop needs to effectively communicate its strategy and build confidence in its crypto venture. Expert Outlook and Actionable Insights Financial analysts and crypto investment experts are offering diverse perspectives on GameStop’s Bitcoin gambit. Some analysts believe it’s a bold and potentially lucrative move, aligning GameStop with a growing asset class and demonstrating forward-thinking leadership. Others express concerns about the lack of synergy between GameStop’s core business and Bitcoin , the risks associated with volatility, and the potential for distraction from addressing fundamental business challenges. Actionable Insights for Investors: Do Your Research: Thoroughly understand Bitcoin , convertible bonds, and GameStop’s business strategy before making any investment decisions. Consider Your Risk Tolerance: Assess your comfort level with volatility and risk, as both GME stock and Bitcoin are known for price swings. Monitor Developments: Keep a close watch on GameStop’s execution of its Bitcoin strategy, regulatory changes in the crypto space, and market reactions. Diversify Your Portfolio: Don’t put all your eggs in one basket. Diversification remains a key principle in managing investment risk. Conclusion: GameStop’s Crypto Leap – A High-Stakes Game GameStop’s decision to embrace Bitcoin through a $1.3 billion convertible bond offering is undoubtedly a shocking and audacious move. It’s a high-stakes game with the potential for significant rewards or considerable risks. Whether this foray into crypto will revitalize GameStop and propel it into a new era of growth, or prove to be a costly distraction, remains to be seen. The market’s initial volatile reaction reflects the uncertainty and divided opinions surrounding this strategic pivot. As GameStop navigates this uncharted territory, the world will be watching closely to see if this meme stock darling can successfully transform itself into a crypto-savvy contender. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action .

title: Why XRP Could Be the Hottest Crypto Investment of 2025
body: The post Why XRP Could Be the Hottest Crypto Investment of 2025 appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News XRP looks bullish right now. At the start of November 5, the price of XRP was just $0.5037. Since then, the market has grown by over 340.61%. During the period, it has outperformed the top two cryptos, Bitcoin and Ethereum. Experts believe that 2025 could be a landmark year for XRP. Why? Curious to know more? Read on! Ripple’s Legal Settlement in the SEC Case Ripple recently reached a positive settlement in its long-standing legal battle against the US Securities and Exchange Commission. The development has provided more clarity about the XRP regulatory environment. It is expected to encourage more institutional players to enter the market. Stablecoin Regulation & Crypto Custody: A Game-Changer for Ripple Ripple is planning to launch new stablecoins. Experts believe that new laws will support the stablecoin segment of Ripple immensely. The SEC recently repealed SAB 121 and issued SAB 122. The new guideline allows banks and financial institutions to apply existing accounting standards for potential losses related to holding customer crypto. Instead of listing all custodied cryptos to liabilities, they can treat potential risks as contingent liabilities. With the new development, banks and other traditional financial institutions might be more willing to enter the crypto custody market. Crypto researcher Anders claims that now that the rule is gone, institutional players might be more interested in offering crypto custody and they could use Ripple’s technology to do it, making Ripple’s custody services more popular. XRP ETFs on the Horizon Anders forecasts that an XRP Spot ETF will be approved by the US SEC in the second half of 2025. At least 10 ETF fund management firms have expressed their interest to launch their XRP Spot ETFs. Polymarket bettors suggest that there is a 84% chance that the US SEC will provide approval for an XRP Spot ETF in 2025. Anders predicts that if the SEC approves an XRP ETF, the XRP price could reach as high as $8. XRP’s Potential Role in the US Digital Asset Stockpile Recently, Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse hinted that XRP might be included in the US Digital Asset Stockpile – which was established by US President Donald Trump through an executive order. In conclusion, with regulatory hurdles cleared and institutional adoption on the rise, XRP could be one of the biggest crypto success stories of 2025. Will Ripple’s momentum lead to a record-breaking rally? title: Solana Price Dips 5% Today, But a $140 Rebound Could Wipe Out $70M
body: Solana, the sixth biggest cryptocurrency in the market, has been continuously disappointing its holders with its price dips. Despite its potential to create ATHs like $294.33, the token trades at $130.70 amid crypto market downturns. Although there’s the possibility of trend reversal, there are significant risks, as SOL price’s recovery to $140 would wipe out $69.62M. Why? Let’s discuss this. Why Did Solana’s Price Drop 5% Today? Solana price has been facing continuous resistance rejections to surge to the $150 mark. Its price surged to nearly $147 a few hours ago but dropped soon. In the last 24 hours alone, the token’s worth had dropped 5%, and it currently trades at $130.70 with a market capitalization of $67.15B. Although this drop is part of the global crypto market downtrend , investors lost confidence in this altcoin, which cannot be ignored. In 2024, it gained significant traction and rallied due to the popularity of Solana meme coins, but that has faded as the demand for these cryptos decreased. The drop in the onchain activity and trading volume clearly explains this investors’ diverted attention. Earlier reports revealed that the 7-day dApp revenue declined nearly 50% within two weeks. At the same time, the fees declined. Critics showed concern that the rising competition amid the introduction of better blockchain networks may impact Solana’s performance significantly. Solana Price Prediction: $140 Rebound to Wipe Out $69.62M Along with many altcoins, Solana is also battling a bearish trend. However, that may not persist as the experts believe it is in a consolidation phase and running within a parallel channel pattern. Analyzing the SOL USDT price chart and analysts’ predictions reveals that it is at a crucial juncture where it can result in an uptrend or a downtrend. Interestingly, a massive liquidation will occur with the SOL price rebounding to $140, wiping out $69.62M in shorts. Crypto analyst Ali Martinez X’s post further confirms this prediction, as he claims a surge to $140 would result in millions of liquidation. This is because the exchange closes the positions of the traders who bet on declines. An upswing to $140 for Solana SOL would liquidate $69 million in short positions! This would result in an SOL price downturn only in the short term, as the liquidation will force buyers to buy back tokens, resulting in a price surge. What’s Next For Solana? Although the $140 mark is the crucial liquidation point, this could influence the price. Experts’ Solana price predictions claim that a surge past this could result in the much-anticipated rally to $240 and higher, but the failure to surge to that will result in a prolonged downturn. Investors must continue to monitor SOL’s next price moves, mainly as SOL ETF approval is being discussed. The post Solana Price Dips 5% Today, But a $140 Rebound Could Wipe Out $70M appeared first on CoinGape .

title: Michael Novogratz's Galaxy Digital Settles $200M Lawsuit with New York AG Over LUNA Manipulation
body: Galaxy Digital, led by Michael Novogratz, has agreed to a $200 million settlement with the New York Attorney General's Office over allegations of manipulating the price of LUNA, the token associated with the collapsed Terra ecosystem. The settlement addresses claims that Galaxy promoted LUNA without disclosing its holdings and sales to the public, leading to significant profits. The New York Attorney General's investigation found that Galaxy Digital engaged in misleading public statements and failed to disclose its sales of LUNA tokens while promoting them. This conduct violated New York laws, resulting in the substantial fine. Galaxy had purchased 18.5 million LUNA tokens in 2020 at a 30% discount, paying $0.22 per token. To continue reading this as well as other DeFi and Web3 news, visit us at thedefiant.io
